name: Furlock Holmes
description:
It’s the pawsome top-down mystery/adventure. You play a lazy house cat owned by an eccentric inventor. Food bowl empty and mom nowhere in sight, you solve puzzles to explore and search each room for clues.

Surpass human-made obstacles and avoid smart-device enemies using your superior cat intellect. It’s up to you to find mom!

W - Move up
A - Move left
S - Move down
D - Move right
M - Interact
R - Reset to Menu


Jeff Row, Vincent Kaufman, and Keli Lindsey
